titleInfo.title: Mountain View Nursery program - 1948-12-24 - 5:30 am show [date unconfirmed]

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: WSM program sponsored by Mountain View Nursery, starring Wally Fowler with the Georgia Clodhoppers and the Oak Ridge Quartet. Likely originally broadcast December 24, 1948 (unconfirmed, based on mentions that the following day will be Christmas day and a Saturday, and the Oak Ridge Quartet lineup of 1948) at 5:30 am. Personnel include Ernie Keller (announcer), and performers Wally Fowler, Floyd Ethridge, Johnny New, Lon 'Deacon' Freeman, Junior Matthews, and Monroe 'Curley' Blaylock.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
